nodes.text: Show me the exact fucking line and page where it says black people cant vote. Show me where black people aren’t allowed to get ID’s. Show me where it shortens early voting (it doesn’t. It allows election centers to have 2 more sundays so 19 early voting days)
None of these retards can tell me what’s in the bill cause they haven’t fucking read it.
NOT A SINGLE. FUCKING. PERSON. CAN TELL ME WHATS RACIST OR “VOTER SUPPRESSION” IN THIS BILL.
